history.reason: That's a lovely simple wish, Koolioguy! Root beer is a delicious treat, and I'd be happy to bring you some. Just remember to share a little, won't you? Ho ho ho!
That's a lovely simple wish, Koolioguy! Cookie is a delicious treat, and I'd be happy to bring you some. Just remember to share a little, won't you? Ho ho ho!
Ho ho ho! Cucumbers are a perfectly delightful and healthy wish, Koolioguy! It's good to see you wanting something fresh. That's a nice wish indeed!
Ho ho ho! Carrots are a perfectly delightful and healthy wish, Koolioguy! It's good to see you wanting something fresh. That's a nice wish indeed!
Ho ho ho! Pineapples are a perfectly delightful and healthy wish, Koolioguy! It's good to see you wanting something fresh and fruity. That's a nice wish indeed!
